import React, { Component } from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { DiJavascript1 } from "react-icons/di"; import { FaHtml5, FaCss3, FaNodeJs, FaReact, FaJava, FaPython, } from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from 'axios' export class About extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { subject:null, email:null, name:null, message:null, about_list:[], program_list:[] } } onChange=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() this.setState({ ...this.state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } onHandleSubmit =(event)=>{ const {email,subject, name,message}=this.state event.preventDefault() const config ={ headers:{ 'Content-Type':'application/json' } } const body= JSON.stringify({ 'email':email,'subject': subject,'name':name,'message':message }) console.log(body) try{ const res=axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/contacts/',body,config) alert('email has been send') } catch(err){ alert(`Message could not be delivered error:${err}`) } } updateList =async() =>{ console.log("ben geciniorum") try{ console.log("response database") axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/about/about-view/').then((res)=>{ console.log("response coming",res.data.results) this.setState({ ...this.state, about_list:res.data.results }) }).catch(err=>{ console.log("err", err) }) console.log(this.state.project_list) } catch(err){ console.log("err", err) } try{ axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/about/programms-view/').then((response)=>{ console.log("fetö borsasi",response.data.results) this.setState({ ...this.state, program_list:response.data.results }) }).catch(err=>{ console.log("err", err) }) console.log(this.state.program_list) } catch(err){ console.log("err", err) } } componentDidMount(){ this.updateList() } render() { return (
{console.log("this.state.about_list", this.state.about_list), this.state.about_list.map((item, index)=>{ console.log('herkes ayni isi mi yapsin?',this.state,item.about_image) return(

About me!

)})}

{element.percentage}%
) })}
